expert_cases.title: SQL Injection in Web Application Frameworks
expert_cases.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in popular web frameworks allows attackers to extract sensitive data from databases. The vulnerability occurs when user input is not properly sanitized before database queries.

Exploitation: Can be exploited through web interface with basic SQL injection techniques.

Impact: Complete database compromise including user credentials and sensitive data.
expert_cases.expert_analysis: Classic SQL injection with modern twist - affects multiple framework versions.
expert_cases.real_world_impact: Multiple data breaches traced to this vulnerability
